description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 16 May 2024 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: For GP, delivery is expected in 9 months.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Project ID: 01587-240778 Stripper Header Attachment for Combine
#### English Title: 01587-240778 Stripper Header Attachment for Combine
#### French Title: Stripper Header Attachment for Combine - 01587-240778 Table écimeuse pour moissonneuse-batteuse

**Tender Overview**
-----------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an amendment to the tender announcement for the supply, and delivery of a Stripper Header attachment for combine to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) located in Lacombe Alberta.

### Tender Details

* **Contract Number:** WS4464029647
* **Modification Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** April 22, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 16, 2024 at 2:00 pm EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 7, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 28, 2025

**Description of Requirements**
-----------------------------

The successful bidder will supply and deliver a Stripper Header attachment for combine to AAFC in Lacombe, Alberta. This attachment will support various agricultural research programs, including agronomic decisions, weed management impacts, and integrated crop protection impacts on cropping systems.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive and Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Nation-wide
* **Regions of Delivery:** Lacombe, Alberta
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* **Contact Name:** Jessica Chartrand (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** jessica.chartrand4@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not Available
* **Fax:** Not Available

**Additional Resources**
-----------------------

* **Tender Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19247188?extsite=MTkyNDcxODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Tender Description:** Please refer to the official tender notice for detailed description of requirements. [1]

This tender is open to bid submissions until May 16,
